item.title: My relationship with the classical guitar
item.description: Written as a note-to-self on how I had fallen in love with the classical guitar in 2023, so that I don’t neglect it for so long again. Just me, my guitar, and my cat, Raindrop. That was all I wanted to need when I fantasized about a devotion to studying the classical guitar on this day, a couple years ago. Prior, I had been thinking about the piano, but it wasn’t very practical because I would have to travel toward one to practice.
